menu.orderList.description: Text in website menu, order represents the orders of services purchased by the user

menu.applicationList.description: Text in website menu, application represents the applications of services used by the user

menu.userProfile.description: Text in website menu, user profile represents the user's personal information

menu.idVerify.description: Text in website menu, ID verification represents the verification of user identity

menu.manageApplication.description: Text in website menu, application management represents the management of user applications

menu.distributionIndex.description: Text in website menu, referral earnings represents the earnings from user referrals

menu.usageList.description: Text in website menu, usage records represents the historical records of using API services

menu.credentialIndex.description: Text in website menu, credentials represent the access credentials for the API

menu.manageOrder.description: Text in website menu, order management represents the management of user orders, where order represents the orders of services purchased by the user

menu.manageDistributionStatus.description: Text in website menu, distribution management represents the management of user distribution status, related to the earnings from user referrals
